remarks: A locally finite refinement of an open cover induces a locally finite open cover with the original index set.  This is fact 2 of http://at.yorku.ca/p/a/c/a/02.pdf , it is expressed by exposing a function ` f ` from the original cover ` U ` , which is taken as the index set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2020.)
